entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:07 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:07 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:07 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
